name: Mail Snail (FreschGames)
description:
This is a Prototype, Do NOT expect a FULL Game. Enjoy :)

Intro

Welcome to Mail Snail, a chill and relaxing singleplayer exploration and memory game where you get to control a snail in a fully random world. With no dangers or abilities to worry about, all you have to do is enjoy the journey and explore the vast and expanding world around you.

As the mail snail, your objective is to find packages scattered throughout the world and bring them back to the town. With every package you deliver, the world expands and gets more complex.

But be careful not to forget where you've been, as your memory will be crucial in navigating the vast and ever-changing world. With every new journey, you'll encounter different landscapes and environments.

So sit back, relax, and immerse yourself in the peaceful and charming world of Mail Snail. Explore at your own pace and take in the beautiful scenery as you go on a journey of discovery and memory.

Controls/Goal

Find the Packages and bring them to town to epxand the world into infinity!

WASD: Move
